shutdown.description:
Shutdown HIVE
Only do this if **REQUIRED**

notify.description: This command is used to add/remove the notify role from yourself.  The notify role is used to give you a notifications channel for streaming events instead of spamming everyone.

code.description: Formatting code is very important on discord.  Type this command to see how to format code properly.

page.description: Send a page request to the doc to get his attention.

clear.description: Clears x amount of messages from a channel.  This cannot be undone.

role.description: Grabs the current user count for a role.

assign.description: Assign an "assignable role" to a user

analyze.description: Analyze the guild channels for the date of last message.  This is used to make judgements on channel cleanup.

ask.description: Used to send a question to a special channel for the doc/staff to answer.  Please remember not to send your question more then once.

admin.description: Get a list of available admin commands sent to you via DM.

Execute order 66.description: Show the true power of the dark side.

Rule34.description: If you have to ask what it is, you're not ready.

Request.description: Found a bug or wanna submit a feature request?  Use this command to get the github page for HIVE

Twitchsub.description: Get information about connecting your Twitch to your discord to receive awesome perks when subscribing.

Stats.description: Get the discord server stats like current channel count and other useful stats.

Getdata.description: Get data from the data file.

Who.description: Get details about a user.  This will output the user's roles, join date, and UserID

Help.description: Gets command description and syntax for a command.

SendMarkers.description: Manually trigger HIVE to send channel markers for a streaming event

getStreamMode.description: Gets the current Stream Mode for passing questions and links

setStreamMode.description: Sets the current Stream Mode for passing questions and links

commands.description: Get a list of all available commands posted to the channel

sponge.description: Turn a string into a spongy text

welcome.description: Trigger the welcome message to be displayed.  The welcome message is the message sent to new users when joining the discord server.

uptime.description: See how long HIVE has been running

updateReference.description: Update the references from the reference datafile.

appendData.description: Add to existing data stored in datafile for key.

writeData.description: Overwrite existing data stored in datafile for key.

removeData.description: Remove a value from a key or the entire key from the datafile.

changelog.description: Post a link to the HIVE github page to view the changelog file.

reflist.description: Get a list of all references.
